thread.title: PICS! Love Birds Anushka Sharma & Virat Kohli Spotted Together On A Lunch Date!
thread.title_full: PICS! Love Birds Anushka Sharma & Virat Kohli Spotted Together On A Lunch Date!

title: PICS! Love Birds Anushka Sharma & Virat Kohli Spotted Together On A Lunch Date!
text:
Posted by: Swikriti Srivastava Updated: Saturday, October 24, 2015, 23:14 [IST] 
One of the most popular love-birds of Bollywood, Anushka Sharma and Virat Kohli , who are allegedly dating each other, spotted together on a lunch date along with Anushka's father, Colonel Ajay Kumar Sharma at a Chinese restaurant in Mumbai on Friday (October 23, 2015).Seems like the Indian vice-captain returned to Mumbai in the mood to celebrate his team's victory against South Africa on Thursday in which he scored a century and what could be the best way than celebrating his success with his ladylove, right guys? 
Reportedly it is also heard that the duo wanted to purchase a property in Mumbai and the three of them (Anushka, Virat & Ajay) met over the property deal. The cricketer looked dashing in his black t-shirt paired with blue jeans. Whereas, Anushka looked no less stylish in a casual white top paired with ripped blue jeans.On the professional front, Anushka Sharma is gearing up for Karan Johar's multi-starrer flick, Ae Dil Hai Mushkil , which also casts Aishwarya Rai Bachchan , Ranbir Kapoor , Fawad Khan & Imran Abbas in the lead roles.Check out the pictures of Anushka & Virat here! PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 1/11 Virat-Anushka

Whereas, Anushka Sharma kept it simple and looked no less stylish in a casual white top paired with ripped blue jeans. PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 4/11 At A Chinese Restaurant 
Anushka Sharma with her alleged boyfriend, Virat Kohli, spotted together at a Chinese restaurant in Mumbai on Friday (October 23, 2015). PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 5/11 Meeting Over Property Deal 
Anushka Sharma's father, Ajay Kumar Sharma was also seen together with the duo and reportedly the trio met over the property deal. PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 6/11 On The Back Seat 
In picture: Anushka Sharma-Virat Kohli on the back seat of the car, being clicked by some shutterbugs. PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 7/11 In A Mood To Celebrate 
Seems like the cricketer returned to Mumbai in the mood to celebrate his team's victory against South Africa on Thursday in which he scored a century. PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 8/11 Pre-Occupied With Karan's Project 
Whereas, Anushka Sharma is pre-occupied with the shooting of her upcoming flick, Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 9/11 Anushka's ADHM 
Anushka's ADHM, also casts Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Ranbir Kapoor, Fawad Khan & Imran Abbas in the lead roles. PICS! Anushka & Virat Spotted Together On A Lunch Date! 10/11
